name: Joined Together -BONDS MUST BE BROKEN
description:
JOINED TOGETHER  

Two wondering souls are trapped in a dungeon. Together they form a unique bond. With this bond they are able to survive and fend off enemies but for them to truly escape the dungeon they must separate. 

USE WASD OR ARROW KEYS TO NAVIGATE  

USE THE LINE THAT CONNECTS THE TWO PLAYERS TO KILL ENEMIES. 

DON'T FORGET TO RATE AND COMMENT. HELPS A LOT 

 OTHER LINKS
